name: Giana Sisters S.E.
description:
Revisit the Amiga classic and it's timeless gameplay, but this time with brand new, amazing graphics and sound effects!

Giana Sisters Special Edition is an unofficial hack of the original Amiga version that replaces the entire visual aspect of the game! The new gfx are either completely new designs or remastered originals, while Giana and some enemies are directly inspired from the 2009 DS version.

Featuring over 200 new tiles and frames of animation, new palettes for each level, cosmetic level edits, a revised scrolling title screen, new logo, splash screen and icon, replacements for many of the original sound effects and a new intro ported from the DS version.

This project is the first release of our new label Reimagine Games, which is focused on non commercial ports, hacks and remakes.
